author: Special Correspondent
text:
The City Police has commissioned a baggage scanner for security screening at the Arulmigu Suhavaneswarar Temple in the city.

This is the first temple to get this sophisticated facility.

The baggage scanner has been installed at the main entrance of the temple for screening the baggage and other articles being carried by the devotees arriving at the temple.

The personnel of the bomb disposal squad and technical wing of the police will man the scanner in rotation, police source said.

The sources said that the government sanctioned sophisticated baggage scanners recently to six police commissionerates in the State. Since the equipment was lying idle, it decided to use it in the busy temples as a temporary measure.

The baggage scanner will be moved to other temples and other places of importance based on need, the sources said.
title: Baggage scanner installed at temple
